a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Air pollution, London vs. Delhi, 1700 to 2016
Average concentrations of suspended particulate matter (SPM), measured in micrograms per cubic metres in
London over the long-term and Delhi's more recent past.
Source: Fouquet (2011) and Government of India (2012-13)
